attributes.additional_details: Parliament needs to pass the bill if Pakistan government do such a act human rights will interfere and take action
attributes.background: Government of Pakistan trying to suppress the voices of women and take there freedom of speech this is human rights violation I want House of Common to intrepid and work closely with human rights institutions to give freedom of women many of women In jail right now

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the current situation in Pakistan, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Condemn ongoing human rights violations in Pakistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638557
